About the Company: Lovable Lingerie Limited is an India-based engaged in the business of manufacturing garments. The Company manufactures womens innerwear. The Companys products include brassieres, panties, slips/camisoles, home wear, shapewear, foundation garments and sleepwear products. The Companys brands include Lovable, Daisy Dee and College Style. The innerwear products manufactured under the brand Lovable cater to the premium segment market in India. Lovable and Daisy Dee are its flagship brands. The Company has established its product, such as All Day Long, Cotton Essensuals, Encircle and Tease.
